snippet: A key government witness in the terrorism trial of an Islamic cleric may testify from Britain via a closed circuit television connection, a federal judge in Manhattan said in a ruling released on Monday.
abstract: Judge Katherine B Forrest of Federal District Court rules that Saajid Badat, key government witness in terrorism trial of radical Islamic cleric Mostafa Kamel Mostafa, may testify from Britain via closed circuit television connection.
lead_paragraph: A key government witness in the terrorism trial of an Islamic cleric may testify from Britain via a closed circuit television connection, a federal judge in Manhattan said in a ruling released on Monday.

headline.main: Testimony From Britain May Be Used in Terror Trial
headline.print_headline: Testimony From Britain May Be Used in Terror Trial
